review: Love it, I'm going to buy 2 more. The hell with high priced cable.
author: Brad Tomasek

review: I love my Fire TV Stick! I already was a Prime member. So I can watch Amazon Prime streaming movies and TV programs. I started watching Downton Abbey and have already gotten to season 4 binge watching! There are other shows I have found to add to my watch list. The games are fun. No regrets!
author: Lisa A. Richardson

review: Doesn't work at all, no help line, no help number. Plug and play, nope .
author: Jeff Glenn

review: Bought for my husbands tv because it was not a smart tv.  He now enjoys all the movies on Netflix and Hulu that I watch on my smart tv.
author: dodd_gail

review: Given to us as a gift. we love it, works great and is very convenient.we use it to watch movies on Plex.
author: Vane Celeste Duque

review: Yes it is a great product.
author: Dwayne Brown

review: Everything I thought it would be.
author: Whitney Goss

review: I love the fire stick, the only issue we have had is the remote. When you try a side to side selection it often jumps way past a single item. Sometimes if it hasn't been used since starting a movie it seems slow to respond. Otherwise we love the features so far!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Easy to install and use. Now I watch YouTube videos on the big screen. It has made my 'dumb' TV smart!
author: Douglas L. Mather "D.LICINIVS.M"
